Package snoozesoft.systray4j

Interface Summary
SysTrayMenuListener The interface that systray menu listeners must implement in order to receive systray menu events from systray icons or menu items.
 

Class Summary
CheckableMenuItem This class represents a labeled menu item with a check mark.
SubMenu This class represents a submenu.
SysTrayMenu This class is the main interface of this package.
SysTrayMenuAdapter An abstract adapter class for receiving systray menu events.
SysTrayMenuEvent Instances of this class are passed to systray menu listeners who want to be informed whenever a systray icon or a menu item is clicked.
SysTrayMenuIcon This class represents a platform specific icon file.
SysTrayMenuItem This class represents a labeled menu item.
